ちょっとずつ: (ちょっとずつ) - little by little; step by step
ちょっとそこまで: (ちょっとそこまで) - nowhere in particular; just out for a bit; (euph. for) toilet break
ちょっと一杯: (ちょっといっぱい) - let's have a quick drink
ちょっと見: (ちょっとみ) - look; glance; (at first) sight
ちょっぴり: (ちょぴり) - very little bit; just a smidgin; wee bit
ちょび髭: (ちょびひげ) - small mustache; short mustache
ちょぴり: (ちょぴり) - very little bit; just a smidgin; wee bit
ちょろちょろ: (チョロチョロ) - in trickles (e.g. water flowing); darting about (e.g. a small animal)/moving rapidly
ちょろっと: (ちょろっと) - simply; a little; insufficiently
ちょろまかす: (ちょろまかす) - to pilfer; to filch; to snaffle; to pocket
ちょん: (チョン) - clap (sound of wooden clappers); chop vigorously; slight movement (e.g. poke, small bird alighting); the end/originally end of a play, marked by clap of clappers; dot (esp. typographical)
ちょんちょん: (ちょんちょん) - sound of something striking repeatedly (e.g. wooden clappers); something small hopping repeatedly/touching lightly and repeatedly; punctuation marks such as the dakuten
ちょんになる: (ちょんになる) - to come to an end; to finish; to get fired
ちょんぼ: (ちょんぼ) - (also written 冲和 or 錯和) apparent and grievous error; mistake; blunder; bungle; goof
ちょんまげ: (ちょんまげ) - (joc) (after the -te form of a verb, punning form of ちょうだい) please do (for me)
ちょん切る: (ちょんぎる) - to chop something off (e.g. head); to snip off; to fire
ちらし寿司: (ちらしずし) - sushi rice in a box or bowl with a variety of ingredients sprinkled on top
ちらちら: (チラッチラッ) - falling lightly (e.g. snow, petals, confetti)/fluttering; flickering/twinkling/glimmering/sparkling/dazzling; appearing and disappearing/catching glimpses; glancing (repeatedly); (hear, see) from time to time/intermittently
ちらっと: (ちらと) - at a glance; by accident
ちらっと見る: (ちらっとみる) - to glance at; to glimpse
ちらつかせる: (ちらつかせる) - to show/to display/to flash; to dangle (an offer) in front of/to hold out/to indirectly hint at/to intimate/to obliquely suggest/to allude to/to imply; to send flurries (of snow, etc.)
ちらつき: (ちらつき) - flickering (e.g. on a video display)
ちらつき防止フィルタ: (ちらつきぼうしフィルタ) - glare filter
ちらつく: (ちらつく) - to flicker; to flit; to litter; to be dazzled
ちらと: (ちらと) - at a glance; by accident
ちらほら: (ちらほら) - sporadically; here and there; now and then; in twos and threes; sparsely
ちらりほらり: (ちらりほらり) - here and there; now and then; twos and threes; sparsely
ちらりズム: (ちらりズム) - the art of giving a brief glimpse of something (e.g. one's underwear)
ちり: (ちり) - dish of fish (meat, etc.), tofu, vegetables boiled together and served with ponzu dipping sauce
ちりこ星: (ちりこぼし) - {astron}  Chinese "Extended Net" constellation (one of the 28 mansions)
ちりちり: (ちりちり) - bits and pieces; frizzily (as in perm)
ちりんちりん: (ちりんちりん) - jingle; ding (sound representing the ringing of small bells)
ちり紙: (ちりがみ) - tissue paper; toilet paper
ちり鍋: (ちりなべ) - dish of fish (meat, etc.), tofu, vegetables boiled together and served with ponzu dipping sauce; pot used to cook such a dish
ちろちろ: (ちろちろ) - flicker (light)/waver; trickle (water); glance at
ちん: (ちーん) - (esp. チーン, ちーん) ding (of a bell)/bing/ting/tinkle/ring; honk (i.e. sound of blowing one's nose)/snort; (from the sound of the microwave timer; usu. チン)  heating in a microwave/cooking in a microwave/microwaving/nuking
ちんけ: (チンケ) - worst; poor and boring; uncool
ちんすこう: (チンスコー) - Okinawan biscuit (similar to shortbread); Okinawan cookie
ちんする: (ちんする) - (from the sound of the microwave timer)  to microwave; to nuke
ちんたら: (ちんたら) - dilatorily/sluggishly; to take a lot of time/to become late/to take it easy
ちんちくりん: (chinchikurin) - short (in height), stumpy, tiny; short (calças, etc.), undersized
ちんちん: (chinchin) - pênis; chink, tingle, tinkle, whistle (chaleira); mendicância (animal); ciúmes
ちんちん電車: (ちんちんでんしゃ) - streetcar, trolley
ちんちん鳴る: (ちんちんなる) - to jingle; to tinkle; to whistle (kettle)
ちんどん屋: (chindon'ya) - traditional Japanese band of sandwich board advertisers
ちんぴら: (ちんぴら) - (young) hoodlum; small-time yakuza; delinquent boy; delinquent girl; hooligan; punk
ちーん: (ちーん) - (esp. チーン, ちーん) ding (of a bell)/bing/ting/tinkle/ring; honk (i.e. sound of blowing one's nose)/snort; (from the sound of the microwave timer; usu. チン)  heating in a microwave/cooking in a microwave/microwaving/nuking
ぢゃない: (ぢゃない) - (from ではない) is not/am not/are not; isn't it?
ぢりぢり: (ぢりぢり) - slowly (but steadily)/gradually/bit-by-bit; irritatedly/impatiently; scorchingly (of the sun); sizzling (i.e. sound of frying in oil); sound of a warning bell, alarm clock, etc.; oozing out (oil, sweat, etc.)/seeping out
っきゃ: (っきゃ) - (used with a negative verb) only; nothing but
っけ: (っけ) - particle indicating that the speaker is trying to recall some information
っこ: (っこ) - doing/in such a state; doing together/contest/match; familiarizing suffix (sometimes meaning "small")
っこい: (っこい) - (after a noun or the stem of an -i adjective) rich in ...; high in ...; full of ...; very ...; quite ...
っこない: (っこない) - (after a verb's -masu base) no chance of (verb)
ったら: (ったら) - indicates supposition/if ... then/when/after; (usu. ったら) (typically after someone's name) indicates exasperation
ったらありゃしない: (といったらない) - (used after adj.) nothing more ... than this; as .... as it could possibly be
ったらしい: (ったらしい) - (after a noun or the stem of an adjective) seeming very... (usu. with a negative connotation)
ったらない: (といったらない) - (used after adj.) nothing more ... than this; as .... as it could possibly be
っちょ: (ちょ) - (after a noun or the root of an adjective) person who is ...; thing that is ...
っつうか: (てか) - or rather (say); or better (say); or perhaps I should say; or, how should I put it,...; I mean
っつーか: (てか) - or rather (say); or better (say); or perhaps I should say; or, how should I put it,...; I mean
って: (て) - (abbr. for と, というのは and other similar combinations)  casual quoting particle; indicates supposition/if ... then; (as かって) indicates a rhetorical question; indicates certainty, insistence, etc.
っていうか: (てか) - or rather (say); or better (say); or perhaps I should say; or, how should I put it,...; I mean
ってか: (てか) - or rather (say); or better (say); or perhaps I should say; or, how should I put it,...; I mean
ってのは: (ってのは) - means; is; as for
ってば: (ってば) - indicates emotional closeness or annoyance with someone; indicates an indirect command by expressing annoyance (in sentence-final position)
ってゆうか: (てか) - or rather (say); or better (say); or perhaps I should say; or, how should I put it,...; I mean
っぱ: (っぱ) - keep ...-ing (negative nuance, with the state being improper, unpleasant, etc.); have been ...-ing; leaving (something) on; leaving (something) still in use
っぽい: (ぽい) - -ish/-like; (ぽい only)   tossing something out/throwing something away
